roleset.name: to base or establish

example.name: passive
example.text: [This species of congressional action]-50 is predicated [*-50]on an interpretation of the appropriations clause that [] is erroneous and unconstitutional .
example.arg: an interpretation of the appropriations clause that [] is erroneous and unconstitutional
